questionTitle: In central Georgia, archaeological evidence indicates that Native Americans first inhabited the area ___.
The difference between libel and slander is that libel is printed while__________.
When ___in arctic regions, the Alerts construct igloos as temporary winter shelters.
Resin is a substance that ___in water.

When a body enters the earth's atmosphere, it travels ________.

America's first globe maker was James Wilson, who ________ and blacksmith in his earlier life.

anwers: fought in the Battle of New Orleans
the Battle of New Orleans was
he fought in the Battle of New Orleans

questionTitle: ________ a mayor, many city governments employ a city manager.
They are planning to build a subway, but it ________ be a difficult undertaking.

An abstract painter and a pioneer of Surrealism, ________ and symbolic images.
anwers: Miro's works are characterized by bright colours
the works of Miro are characterized by bright colours
Miro is famous for works characterized by bright colours
bright colours characterize the works of Miro

questionTitle: The common crow, ________ one of the hardiest birds in existence, can live up to eighty years.
